timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we find out why the existing NodeReportHandler that is part of the created SCM not getting triggered?
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: @cku328 Thanks for the refactoring. I looked at the description of the test, and the what we are trying to validate. The test is meant to validate the logic to process a NodeReport correctly. It is not meant to validate whether a Node report is processed IF a heartbeat is got. Hence, I am OK with either of your patches - Using nodeReportHandler.onMessage or using nodeManager.processNodeReport. Maybe it is better to use the onMessage to keep it consistent with the other test you recently fixed. what do you think?
replies.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: Thanks @avijayanhwx for the comment, I changed some code so that NodeReport can be sent out with the initial heartbeat. I confirmed the NodeReportHandler in SCM is working properly and it can be triggered to process node reports from multiple nodes.
replies.author: cku328
